text.section: This County may provide, in quadruplicate, suitable serial numbered forms of summons and complaint for notifying alleged violators to appear and answer to charges of violating this article. Such forms may be issued to and receipted for by the law enforcement officials. The County Court Clerk shall each month report to the County Court Judges the disposition made by the law enforcement officials of all such forms issued to them. All law enforcement officials making arrests or issuing summons with promise to appear shall use this form.
